readable.content: A man in jeans is standing in front of a reception desk . A man wearing a shirt that says " Gigolo " is standing at a front desk area with his back to the camera . A man wearing a t-shirt that says " Gigolo " stands at the counter talking to someone . A young man in a " GIGOLO " shirt at a reception desk . Man wearing Gigolo shirt gets assistance at front desk .
